title: Tour, apply and secure your home today! 🌞
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 516 Sq.
Experience the best that University Place and the South Sound have to offer.
Boasting a variety of floor plans ranging from thoughtfully designed Studios to amazing Two-Bedrooms, all featuring indulgent finishes and high-end appliances.

Larson residents are able to perfectly balance work and play with planned amenities like a private fitness studio and reservable office space in addition to our roof-top retreat and pet spa; there is something for everyone!
Minutes from all your favorite shopping and abundant recreational opportunities, you have a can't miss combination of style and convenience at Larson!
Double Pane Windows, Heating, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Breakfast Nook, Dishwasher, Smoke Free, Walk-In Closets, Cable Ready, Granite Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Disposal

Key Fob Entry, Grills, Conference Room, Pet Play Area, Recycling, Fitness Center, Bike Storage, Controlled Access, Business Center, Renters Insurance Program, Pet Spa, Public Transportation, Package Service, Lounge, Elevator, 24 Hour Availability, Clubhouse
